    Geomorphic Management Units (GMUs)

    Gerald H. Taranto

    Wed 01, December, 2021

    scapesClassification_02_0_GMU.Rmd

    The following articles explain how to use how to use scapesClassification to classify marine seafloor structures, hereafter referred to as geomorphic management units (GMUs).

    The GMU-classification will be presented in four separate articles:

    1. Format input data;

    2. Island shelf unit (ISU)

    3. Local maxima on gridded data;

    4. Independent objects on raster surfaces.

    Developed by Gerald H. Taranto.
